```{r}
library("rvest")
library("polite")
library("httr")
library("dplyr")

url <- "https://www.imdb.com/chart/toptv/"
  
 session <- bow(url, 
                 user_agent = "Student education purpose")
 session

# session_page <- scrape(session)  
# page <- read_html(url)

rank_title <-character(0)
links <- character(0)

 titles <- scrape(session)%>%html_nodes("h3.ipc-title__text")%>%html_text()
 titles

 title_list <-as.data.frame(titles[2:26])
 
 split_df<-strsplit(as.character(title_list$rank), ".",fixed = TRUE)
 
split_df <- data.frame(do.call(rbind,split_df))

split_df <-split_df[- c(3,4)]

#colnames(split_df) <-c("ranks","title")

str(split_df)
  
```
